# Magic Fang (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[Bestial (Domain)|Bestial 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Elven Archer Spells|Elven archer 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Summoner Spells|Summoner 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 308

*Magic fang* gives one natural weapon or unarmed strike of the subject a +1 enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls. The spell can affect a slam attack, fist, bite, or other natural weapon. The spell does not change an unarmed strikeâ€™s damage from nonlethal damage to lethal damage.

*Magic fang* can be made permanent with a *[[Permanency (Spell)|permanency]]* spell.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Elven archer 1 to Level per New Paths Compendium (Kobold Press), pg. 20.
